document_data.name: Spidersilk armor
document_data.mainbody: '''Spidersilk armor''' was a type of armor used on [[Toril]].
document_data.Description: Spidersilk armor was crafted from treated [[aranea]] or [[drider]] [[spidersilk|silk]]. It was soft and very light but was also surprisingly resilient.
document_data.Variations: * '''[[Piwafwi]]:''' A piwafwi was another form of clothing made from spider silk. Rather than full armor, piwafwis were cloaks. They often had magical properties.
